first_screen.heading: Teaching community for Nervos developers.
first_screen.sub_heading: Committed to help new CKB developers have a easy learning curve.
first_screen.sub_heading_modifier: Here we provide easy-to-understand interactive courses and technical documents to help Nervos ecological development.
first_screen.contribute: CKB School is an open-source community that welcomes developers who are passionate about the Nervos ecosystem to join and contribute high-quality courses and documentation.

course.heading: Some Courses
course.sub_heading: We will soon be adding easy-to-understand courses for each knowledge point, and it's worth mentioning that we've also added some interesting features to them.

interactive.title: Interactive courses
interactive.description: Each chapter of the course has a certain level of interactivity. Only after completing the interaction and understanding the chapter content can you proceed to the next chapter or course.

nft.title: NFT badges
nft.description: By completing specific chapters of the course, you can trigger a badge reward and receive a commemorative NFT badge provided by the Nervape team.

keyword.title: Keyword preview
keyword.description: Each article section in every chapter contains annotated keywords that are associated with summary explanations to facilitate quick understanding of the nouns.

course.contribute: CKB School is an open-source community that welcomes developers who are passionate about the Nervos ecosystem to join and contribute high-quality courses and documentation.

ecosystem.heading: Start running
ecosystem.sub_heading: Have you completed all courses? It's time to start the CKB development journey
ecosystem.sub_heading_modifier: To this end, we have carefully selected some resources that you may use next

contribute.heading: Contribute to CKB School
contribute.sub_heading: This website is open source. You can propose edits to any of the content on this site, suggest awesome new features, or help us squash bugs.
